content.p: Concrete guides to working with or on gump:

ul.li: How To Fix Gump Build Problems: this document explains the steps you should take if gump send you or a project you participated in an e-mail.
How To Get Built By Gump: this document explains how to add new projects to gump, focussing mostly on the gump object model, our xml descriptors that tell gump how to "do its thing".
